raw_text: ? 5 describes and presents the results of experiments involving re cog nizing textual entailment (Giampiccolo et al, 2007), paraphrase identification (Dolan et al, 2004), and an answer selection task for question answering (Wanget al, 2007)

raw_text: Lately, this formalism has been used as an alternative to phrase-based parsing for a variety of tasks, ranging from machine translation (Ding and Palmer, 2005) to relation extraction (Culotta and Sorensen, 2004) and question answering (Wang et al, 2007) .Let us first describe formally the set of legal dependency parse trees
